attributes.additional_details:
I'm sure most people would agree that alternative Power generation is necessary BUT their positioning is problematic
All Power companies should be legally obliged to provide free Power, (and Gas if part of their portfolio), to anyone with direct line of sight of such a Turbine from their property
This would ensure that 'they' positioned them more remotely OR even be positively asked to situate them in 'poor' areas of the UK - (I would have one in my back garden to save the iniquitous fees charged by the Cartels - they are surely more attractive than pylons?)
